channel.title: Popcorn Mafia (2/6) The Mafia have won!
channel.description:
https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fm-popcorn-mafia-turbo-version-canned-like-it-never-existed-rip/76722/1
# welcome to the game! https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-official-hub/1515
## Popcorn Mafia - Gameplay
* Right before the game begins, after alignments are rolled, the Mafia must choose one player to start as Gunholder. * Everyone is always aware of who is currently holding the gun. * The person who holds the gun can at any time shoot another player. * If the player they shoot is mafia, that mafia goon will die. * If the player they shoot at is town, the shooter will die and the town they shot at will become the new Gunholder. * The town wins when all mafia are dead. The mafia win when the number of mafia is greater than the remaining town. * The game is nightless and there are no lynches. After receiving the gun, you have 10 minutes to shoot another player or you will die and a random town player will get the gun. * The Gunholder shoots by typing **/Shoot [Player Name]** in thread. * Mafia will have a day chat where they can use all the time. * Mafia cannot hold the Gun. More can be found here (this is a turbo version though):
5x Citizens 3x Mafia
Playerlist: 1) James 2) Htm 3) Minho 4) Boss110 5) MaximusPrime 6) 7) 8)
